title: fuq halp pls m8
body: WHY I HAVE LB ? MY POWER WAS TAKED OFF ABOUT 3 HOURS AND YOUU YOU GUYS GIVED ME LB

replies.body:
Interesting. It's not possible to earn a low-priority queue for a *single disconnection*, so there must have been a *recent trend of disconnections* that occurred on your account. I definitely recommend you check out our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more info on this system.

If you are disconnecting due to any other technical issues, please let me know so we can troubleshoot them together.
